meeting_request.purpose: Help with adjusting to biology coursework and feeling overwhelmed by academic expectations
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Timothy, a senior biology major. I’ve been doing well academically, with a 3.7 GPA and a mix of biology and math courses. However, I’m feeling a bit lost lately. Some of my biology classes have covered different topics, and I’m not sure how to connect what I’m learning to real-world applications or how I’ll apply it. I’m also feeling pressure to do well in finals, which are coming up soon. I’m not sure if I should be worried about grades or if I’m just getting tired of the coursework. I’d like some guidance on how to stay on track and feel more confident in my biology studies.
